revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Bucke, date note, annotation fo mrsMrs. turner and Walt's recent visit
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
i suppose you have arrived safe to your place of business as i have not had any news i conclude you are all right i hope none of them disagreable disagreeable spels spells has attacked you well walterWalter we are all about the same as when you left George dident didn't come the day you left he wrote to me friday Friday 17th but i dident didn't get it till monday Monday 20th saying he would not be home till the 1 of the month i kept the light burning all night saturday Saturday night thinking he would come late but when i found he dident didn't come i dident didn't feel uneasy for i thought he couldent couldn't leave i had a few lines from
Jeffy this week they seem to be pretty well he said he wished you would write to him i have not much to write about Walter dear but i thought i had so many envelopes i could afford to use one of the small ones i may not write next week if i get your letter all right as i shall be pretty busy i may if i have any thing of importance to write i doo do hope you feel well waltWalt you must write about the new clerk
old mrsMrs. turner next to where we used to live in this street died on the 20 is buried to morrow
